abstract: Elliot Schrage, vice president for public policy at Facebook, answers reader questions about Facebook and its approach to privacy.
snippet: Elliot Schrage, vice president for public policy at Facebook, answers reader questions about Facebook and its approach to privacy.
lead_paragraph: Last week we asked readers to submit questions about Facebook and its approach to privacy, which Elliot Schrage, vice president for public policy at the company, had agreed to answer.
